alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Gadsden, north central Leon, southern Grady, Thomas, northwestern Brooks and south central Colquitt Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Thomasville to near Midway. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Havana, Thomasville, Tallahassee, Moultrie, Pavo, Coolidge, Freemont, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Darsey, Dillon, Scotland, Enon, Rocky Hill, Iamonia, Merrillville, Chastain, Moultrie Municipal A/P, Murphy, Hinson and Forest Meadows Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
